name: thead
summary: The `<thead>` HTML element defines a set of rows defining the head of the columns of the table.
tagOmission: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag may be omitted if the thead element is immediately followed by a tbody or tfoot element.
permittedParents: A table element. The thead must appear after any caption or colgroup element, even implicitly defined, but before any tbody, tfoot and tr element.
